11111.content:
Ashley was a typical high school senior, she went to high school and lived with her single mother with very little issues. She wasn’t the best student or most adult person out there sure but, she was quite self sufficient from a very young age. You see her parents got divorced when she was really young, probably still in diapers and as a result she was practically forced to grow up really quickly. She was out of diapers at the early age of 2, she learned how to read before even going to pre school and overall excelled in being ready for her next stages in life. However, as she approached her final days of high school it seemed a higher power had other plans... this is the story of how the kid who had to grow up very fast was sent hurtling back down to relive a childhood she never really had.

It would all start as Ashley woke up to some minor shocks. For one everything in her room was huge to the point where she felt disoriented. Then, her breasts which she had some form of pride in were gone! Replaced with abit of a gut... then, the worst of it hit her and she realized what had happened. She took a look in the mirror to confirm her theory and staring back at her she saw...

While Ashley was curious about what sort of toys Faye could come up with, she was also pretty curious about what was outside. She had never been in these woods before, and she had the feeling there was something special to them if this was where a fairy could call "home".

She turned to Faye and said, "Let's pway outside!"

"Ooh, that's a nice choice. I know of a few areas around here that could be fun for a little human to play around in. Come on, I'll show you."

Faye flew out the door while Ashley toddled after her. She stopped for a second to look behind and wiggle her butt in its leafy padding. It seemed odd to be wearing nothing but that, but that thought passed relatively quickly as she continued to follow after the fairy. She tripped on the way out the door, but before she landed on the ground, she felt herself being caught by... well, she couldn't really see what it was. It felt like air blowing, but it was keeping her from falling and hurting herself. She looked up to see Faye with her hands out, like she was trying to keep a hold of something. Soon, Ashley could feel herself lifted back up and then planted on her feet properly.

"Wow, that was a close one! Are you alright?" asked Faye, worried.

Ashley nodded her head. "I think so," she said, still not quite sure what happened.

"Good," said the fairy. "Now then, Ashley, let's take you someplace that'll be nice and fun to play in."

"Movs again?" Ashley asked. She had remembered the large moths that had carried her to Faye's house last night.

"No, little one, not this time. Those moths are nocturnal, and sleep during the day." explained Faye. "Besides, there's more than one way to get a child of your size from point A to point B."

She spun her hands around in a circle, and then Ashley felt herself being lifted off the ground by that same airy sensation that stopped her fall earlier.

"Want to know what it feels like to fly?" asked Faye.

"Yeah!" Ashley said, childlike glee taking over, but then she started to look around for what was carrying her. "What is dis?"

"This, sweetie, is wind magic. Don't worry about falling, I made it so it'll carry you along as it follows my lead." The fairy did a somersault in the air before taking off ahead. "Now let's go!"

As Ashley was blown through the air, she could feel herself being guided around the branches and through the trees right behind Faye, and as she looked down and saw her feet dangling in the air, she began to giggle and kick them, enjoying the sensation. Then she leaned forward until she was flat on her belly and held her arms out at her sides. As she looked down, she really felt like she was flying through the air. While Ashley still had getting home somewhere on her mind, she had a feeling she'd enjoy being a toddler for the time being.

But then another thought came to mind: where was she being taken to?

124.content:
Cassandra Bailey, or Miss Bailey to her students, was a teacher. Specifically she taught English and despite her relative youth among some of the other teachers at the school she took her job seriously. And occasionally this meant handing out detentions which is where this story begins.

"Come on, Ellie. It's not a difficult task, just write a sentence not even a full paragraph." Cassandra said, her arms crossed. Cassandra was in her usual teaching attire, a white button-up blouse, pants and heels. Her red hair was done up in a bun to keep it out of her face. She adjusted her spectacles in frustration as the student in front of her continued to be difficult.

"I don't know what to write about, Miss Bailey! Who gives a shit about Shakespeare?" The student's name was Ellie, she was 15 years old and a constant troublemaker in Cassandra's class. Even now she was wearing a non-school uniform jumper and looking at her phone whenever she thought her teacher wasn't looking. She ran a hand through her blonde hair before crossing her arms back at Cassandra. "Seriously, it's not even real English!"

"Ellie, don't scream at me. If you behave like a child, I'll keep treating you like one." Cassandra said.

Ellie muttered in response as she slinked back down into her seat. "Wish l could treat you like a child..."

Cassandra sighed and shook her head as she turned back to the board, she could feel a headache coming on and Ellie was making her so frustrated that she was feeling dizzy.

"It's really simple, Ellie. Shakespeare was an authour who live-" Cassandra started as she began writing on the whiteboard, she turned around to make sure Ellie was paying attention but as she did her glasses fell off of her face. She went to pick them up but that dizzy feeling struck her again. "Oh, umm..."

"Oh my god, Miss Bailey." Ellie said, then mimed for her teacher to look down.

Cassandra turned beet red as she saw that her pants had fallen down to her ankles, leaving her pink panties on display. She went to pull them up but realised that the sleeves of her blouse had fallen past her hands.

"I don't feel... so good..." Cassandra said.

"Miss, you're turning into a kid!" Ellie said, having a front row seat to this bizarre transformation. Cassandra already looked she was no older than ten and she was looking very unsteady on her feet.

"What? That can't be right..." Cassandra tried to take a step back but fell out of her now oversized shoes, her panties tangled around her ankles she tried to crawl back as she got younger and younger, eventually she stopped. The transformation having been too much for her, she passed out.

Ellie got up from her desk, completely baffled by what had just happened. On the floor, wrapped in her own blouse and squirming sleepily was...

"Ewwie... wat's goin on?" Cassandra asked. "Did I doze off?"

"Umm, something like that..." Ellie sat down in front of the teacher, still shocked.

Cassandra rubbed the sleep from her eyes and looked down at herself. She let out an adorable "Eep!" And covered herself, having realised that she was completely naked. "Ewwie! Why am I nude?!"

Cassandra tried to stand up but fell back on her bottom. "A-an' fat?!" Cassandra looked at the pot belly of baby fat that she suddenly had and patted herself on the tummy.

"I'm not sure what happened, Miss Bailey... But you're a baby." Ellie said, holding her phone so that Cassandra could see herself with the front facing camera.

"Wat!? H-how... Wat happen'?" Cassandra said, having to hold the phone with both hands. It was more like the size of a tablet to her right now. "I'm a... a baby."

Ellie looked down at her former teacher, once so full of confidence. The teacher who always picked on her, tried to make her do her stupid work and kept her after school when she wouldn't and Ellie's feelings of sympathy began to evaporate, instead being replaced with thoughts of humiliation and revenge.

Cassandra had dropped Ellie's phone and picked up her discarded panties in an effort to cover herself, she pulled them up and was able to cover her immature vagina but she still felt utterly naked and terribly vulnerable. It was then she remembered who she was giving detention to. One of her most troublesome students who never hesitated to pick a fight with her, she was no stranger to Ellie's attempts at humiliation, in her time teaching her Ellie had started rumours about Cassandra and had even once thrown a bucket of water on her when she'd been wearing a white shirt.

"We should probably get you something to wear, Miss Bailey. We can't have a little girl like you running around in the nude." Ellie said menacingly.

Cassandra took a step back from Ellie, her eyes darting around. An uneasiness was growing in the pit of her stomach... There was no other option.

Cassandra would breathe a sigh of relief... but then grimace as she realized her situation. She was now a naked (thanks to her dropping her panties along the way) 2 year old toddler in the vents of a high school... sure these vents lead outside... but from there she’d still be a naked toddler outside, which could only lead to so many situations... she needed to go somewhere safe and hide until the cover of night where she could grab her keys from her room and silently escape... question was where?

124112.content:
Cassandra released the breath that she didn't realise she'd been holding when she was finally no longer able to hear Ellie's footsteps echoing through the hallway, for the sake of her own safety she waited another few minutes before climbing out of the vent.

The toddlerfied teacher stood for a moment, taking in her now oversized surroundings before a passing draft reminded her of a pressing issue.

"I need some cwothes..." Cassandra said, covering herself in vain. She was barely able to get her chubby arms to cross her babyish belly. She stifled a whimper for her wasted efforts dieting and exercising the past few months, before steeling her resolve. "One thin' at a time."

Cassandra started to make her way towards the Home Economics room, she'd substituted there once or twice and she knew that they had some baby supplies to teach teens how to use them.

"I don' wike the idea, but I gotta make do with diapuhs." She muttered to herself, just the thought was enough to make her blush bright red all over. On one hand she felt helpless here by herself, but on the other hand at least no-one was around to see her reduced to a tubby little blushing toddler. No-one except...

"Cassie~! Come on Baby Cass, I know you're here somewhere... come to mommy..."

Cassandra could hear Ellie's voice coming from the next hall over. She still didn't want to imagine what the delinquent might have in store for her if she caught, but she figured it'd be more humiliating than just being seen running around in the nude.

She had to move quickly, Home Ec was the next room on her left... but a sign on the door sent a shiver down Cassandra's tiny spine.

PULL

Cassandra had never felt such a sense of doom from one word before, she'd already been wondering if she'd have enough to strength to push the door open, but at least that way she'd have been able to use her weight, tiny though she may be.

She struggled against the door anyway, attempting to muster all the strength within her infant body. She fell back onto her nude bottom, pink with effort and beginning to sweat.

"Cassie~! I know you're still here somewhere." Came the voice of her would be tormentor. For a moment she considered giving in, it might be embarrassing but Ellie probably wouldn't her... right?

But then the tiny teacher saw salvation, an open window above the bench outside of the classroom. She shook off the thought of defeat and hoisted herself up on to the bench, first she pulled herself up with her arms then she wiggled her little body over the edge resting face down for a moment. The metal of the bench was cold on her tubby belly,.

Cassandra jumped back to her feet, time was of the essence as she climbed up the wall putting her pudgy hand on the window sill, her exercise regime paying off after all even in this diminished state, she lifted one leg over the opening of the window. She stopped to catch her breath for a moment, she was panting, she felt like she'd been running a mile.

But the sight of Ellie's blonde hair coming around the corner was all the motivation she needed to cross the finish line. She threw herself into the classroom, and although the fall was only about 3 feet from the window it felt like a long way down to little Casandra.

She hit the carpeted floor with a tiny thud, she panted away, her tiny lungs working overtime as she slowly sat up feeling the bristly carpet against her bare butt.

A moment passed, and then another. She breathed a sigh of relief and felt a moment of personal triumph before it turned sour.

Cassandra still seated, looked down between her little legs unable to stop herself as urine began to flow. She felt humiliated as a wet patch spread though the carpet, the wet feeling spreading to her under her bottom. When she finally stood she was cold, dripping and holding back tears.

Audrey was beyond confused. Who put her in a diaper? How did someone else get in her room?
As she sat up, she noticed her Room was much larger she climbed off the bed, which was actually a little scary for her, and walked, or more accurately, waddled, to a large mirror that was placed beside the closet.

Audrey must have been dreaming. She could not believe was in the mirror.

She looked down at her diaper as she lifted her shirt to see purple sides to the white garment.

“There is no way I’m wearing a diaper.”

1251341121.content:
Audrey managed to get out of her room and to the daycare with a surprising lack of trouble. The halls were mostly empty with the guests enjoying the cruses activities and the few people she did see she either managed to duck away from or they paid her no mind.

She did have one complaint though: the reason she was risking this trip anyway. Her diaper. She couldn’t keep the grimace off her face as she toddled along, the mess in her diaper shifting with every step with the sagging padding now long grown cold and clammy. She was tempted more than once to just rip the thing off but somehow managed until she was at the daycare.

Sneaking in was also no real issue either, the main door was completely open. She ignored the colorful decorations and hurried along as fast as she could hoping to find some diapers and get out. As much as she would rather not wear them the fact that she needed a change clearly demonstrated she needed them.
She didn’t get far though. “How did you get out?!?” A shocked woman’s voice suddenly yelled form behind her. Audrey turned in panic to see a shocked daycare worker just behind her. The toddler tried to run, but didn’t make it two steps before she felt hands under her arms and she found herself hoisted into the air.
Audrey was soon face to face with the worker whose shocked expression was replaced with a warm smile. “Hi there little one. My names Susan. What’s yours?” “Au-audrey.” The toddler stammered out on instinct.

Susan’s’ smile grew. “Audrey, that’s a pretty name! Do you need a change sweetie?” The toddler nodded in embarrassment, mortified beyond belief that not only had she been caught with a dirty diaper but now a stranger was going to change her!

Fortunately for what was left of the regressed girls dignity Susan made no comment and quickly had the toddler clean, powdered and in a fresh princess diaper. “There we go! All better?” Audrey couldn’t help but nod. The new diaper felt wonderful compared to her old one. Maybe this would be easy after all? Embarrassing but easy.
That hope was soon dashed when Audrey was carried into another room, a playroom from the colorful walls and many toys scattered around. Many older kids played on the floor with various toys and games, but Audrey found herself carried over into a corner. “No, no, no!” She cried trying to wiggle away as she was set into a real playpen.

“Sorry sweetie, but you’re too little to be around the big kids.” Susan explained gently ruffling her hair. “Just play with some of the others until its time to go home ok?” Susan left without waiting for a response. Audrey immediately scrambled to her feet. The mesh walls of the pen went past her neck, she could barely see over it let alone get her legs over. She was trapped.

She immediately looked around, maybe something could help her? What she was though were around a half dozen toddler boys and girls in various outfits but all in diapers, looking at her, all having stopped what they were doing to examine the newcomer. Audrey whimpered a bit at the looks, suddenly afraid to move and wondering what her "playmates" would do.

info.brief_description: Through some means unknown, an adult woman is transformed back into a toddler.
info.description:
Through some form or means, an adult woman of some age between 18 and 40 is transformed into a Toddler in the age range of 2 to 4 again for unknown reasons. Go nuts with the ideas.

Rules:
- Outside of the inital starting posts, I ask you try to keep some semblance of length with the options.
- Try not to be too graphic, CP is MOST CERTAINLY not allowed.
- Try to keep to the topic of them being turned into a Toddler again, don’t have them go out on some super adventure or something please.
- Be realistic about this, don’t have the regressed adult constantly shitting and pissing without a timeskip or something.
- No other transformations, keep it strictly to Age Regression.
- DL/Humiliation stories are allowed, so long as they stick to the physical regression theme.
- NO MENTAL AR. Only Physical.
- I will add rules as needed so please don’t make me have to add a bunch of obvious ones like “have good grammar” and whatnot.
